name: ANDREWS JOSE
description: Andrews Jose , Founder and CEO of Accredit360, is a Ph.D. scholar in Computer Science who contributes to institutional  quality frameworks like NAAC, NBA, and IQAC, and serves as the Assistant Head of the Computer Science and Engineering Department (CSED).

name: ANNU ANTONY
description: Annu Antony is an Indian actress who made her film debut as Devika in Aanandam (2016). A graduate of Christ University, Bengaluru, she has since appeared in notable Malayalam films such as Hridayam, Pookkaalam, and Swakaryam Sambhavabahulam. She is widely recognized for her natural charm and expressive performances in contemporary Malayalam cinema.

name: GOWRI N
description: Gowri N is a dynamic travel influencer known for her energetic storytelling, stunning visual content, and culturally rich travel insights that inspire and engage her audience.

name: RAUL JOHN AJU
description: Raul John Aju is a teen AI-prodigy from Kerala who founded an AI startup, built over 10 AI tools and the humanoid robot called Me‐bot by age 16, and has taught AI to more than 140,000 students and businesses online.

name: VINITHA KOSHY
description: Vinitha Koshy,an actress from Kollam who previously worked as a paediatric counsellor in Singapore, made her  debut in Aanandam (2016),rose to fame with her State Award-winning role in Ottamuri Velicham (2017), and has since acted in films like Aby, Luca, Operation Java.

name: CHEF PILLAI
description: Chef Pillai is a Kerala-born chef who started  as a waiter, worked for 14 years in top restaurants in London, like Veeraswamy, gained fame on MasterChef: The Professionals (UK), and founded restaurant Chef Pillai (RCP) chain.

name: Rena Fathima
description: Rena Fathima, hailing from Kerala and pursuing her BBA in Aviation is a content creator and entrepreneur. From beauty and skincare to motivation, travel, and finance, she has built a strong digital presence rooted in relatability and purpose. Balancing studies, brand collaborations, and her own clothing store, she stands as a symbol of financial independence and self-belief—encouraging young women to be resilient, self-reliant, and resolute in shaping their own futures.

name: RAHUL RAMACHADRAN
description: Rahul Ramachandran is an Indian film director and scriptwriter in the Malayalam film industry who started with short films in 2017, deputed with Jeem Boom Bhaa (2019), scripted Njan  Kanda Superman (2019), and later directed the Suresh Gopi project SG 251.
